label: PatternTokenizer
description: Tokenizer that uses regex pattern matching to construct distinct tokens. Implemented using Apache Lucene.

fields.label: Pattern
fields.tooltip: A regular expression pattern to match token separators. Default is an expression that matches one or more non-word characters.

fields.label: Group
fields.tooltip: The zero-based ordinal of the matching group in the regular expression pattern to extract into tokens. Use -1 if you want to use the entire pattern to split the input into tokens, irrespective of matching groups. Default is -1.
